No better way to summarize my thoughts on the release of the Mueller Report. https://twitter.com/PennLive/status/1118938052263542784 …

The case is closed. It is now our duty as members of Congress to move on and get back to work for the American people and address important issues like the crisis at the southern border, which I witnessed first-hand this week.
Attorney General Barr has complied with the law at every step of this process, fulfilling what Congress called on him to do unanimously earlier this year.

There was no collusion with the Russians by President Trump or his campaign, there was no obstruction of justice committed by the President, and to claim otherwise on either or these fronts would be a direct contradiction of the facts.
The release of the Mueller Report confirms the top line conclusions issued by Attorney General Barr a couple of weeks ago.
